definitions.definition: cause (someone) to remember someone or something.
examples: he would have forgotten the boy's birthday if you hadn't reminded him
synonyms: prompt "I left a note to remind him"

definitions.definition: cause someone to think of (something) because of a resemblance or likeness.
examples: his impassive, fierce stare reminded her of an owl
synonyms: evoke "the song reminded me of my sister"

definitions.definition: bring something, especially a commitment or necessary course of action, to the attention of (someone).
examples: the bartender reminded them that singing was not permitted
